text: vy vidznachyly tsyu kotru pretenziyu shcho vony viryat π v shcho buly vidkryti do vas, ta u shcho buly vidkryti pered tym, yak vy, todi uphold unjust zakony yikhnikh idoliv? Vony buly nakazani shchob vidkhylyty taki zakony. Diysno, tse yavlyaye soboyu bazhannya chorta pryvesty yikh daleko astray
